summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a potential meeting. The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication and includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is identified as the CEO of an investment bank and is in communication with Jeffrey Epstein regarding a meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual in the email exchange, reaching out to Jes Staley to arrange a meeting.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are communicating about arranging a meeting, indicating a social or professional relationship.

keyFacts: Jes Staley is identified as the Chief Executive Officer of an investment bank.
Jeffrey Epstein is using a personal email address for communication.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating the information is privileged.
The communication suggests a meeting was being arranged for the same evening.
